content: North Carolina Governor Beth Purdue has recently proposed a bill that will increase taxes on a pack of cigarettes by $1.00 a pack and raise the tax on booze by at least 5%. I agree with this tax and only hope this money doesn't go towards our education system here in this state. I'm tired of throwing money at these drug addicted brats.
